name: Ukraine
startIntroPart1: Hail to you, o great hetman Ivan Sirko. Ukraine is one of the successors of the medieval realm of Kievan Rus. As such, Ukraine has a claim to the lands of the Rus alongside Russia. This has brought Ukraine and Russia conflict against each other on who leads Kiev. Ukraine is led by Ivan Sirko and his Cossack hosts.
startIntroPart2: Lord Hetman, the Cossacks look to you to lead them into freedom and greatness. Will you wrest the Rus away from the Muscovite pretenders? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your lands will soon be mine, prepare for war!
attacked: Have you declared war on us? This was a huge mistake on your part, prepare to be destroyed!
defeated: You have destroyed our once great civilization. History will not look kindly upon you.
introduction: Greetings, stranger! I am Ivan Sirko, Vataman of Zaporizhian Cossacks. Gaze in awe on the majesty that is our great nation!
hateHello: You again! What did you want?
tradeRequest: Well, how is my proposal to you?
uniques: [-33]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities connected to capital]

name: Canada
introduction: Welcome to Canada. As their first Prime Minister, I give you my warmest welcome. Would you mind playing a game of ice hockey?
tradeRequest: Better hurry, I may change my mind.

name: Iran
attacked: Fool! You will soon regret dearly! I swear it!
defeated: You have won, congratulations. My palace is now in your possession, and I beg that you care well for the people and pray to Allah.
introduction: Welcome foreigner, I am Ruholla Khomeini, ayatollah of this beautiful land. Come and tell me about your empire.
uniques: [Faith] cost of purchasing items in cities [-25]%
